info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...ICY CONDITIONS CONTINUE FOR THE AFTERNOON COMMUTE... Temperatures will drop into the lower to mid 20s through 5pm with light freezing rain and drizzle continuing across the region. Additional flat ice accretions of a few hundredths of an inch are likely across the region. The freezing rain will continue to coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Across eastern Orange County and western Putnam counties, flat ice accretions may approach 1/2" in spots, which may cause some downed tree branches and power lines. Locations impacted include... Danbury, Shelton, New City, Newburgh, Middletown, West Milford, Ossining, Peekskill, Southbury, Monsey, Nanuet, Ramsey, Ringwood, Haverstraw and Pompton Lakes. A Winter Weather Advisory is in effect for the area. Please monitor local media outlets and the National Weather Service for further statements.
